data.title: St Aloysius' College
data.text:
Profile

I started my Headship at St Aloysius in September 2020. I have substantial experience in senior leadership in Catholic schools both at The Cardinal Vaughan Memorial School, Kensington and at Cardinal Pole Hackney. I have also worked on school improvement for the Catholic Diocese of Southwark and was a Foundation Governor from 2014 to 2017.

I studied Mathematics followed by the Higher Diploma in Education at University College Dublin. I then completed an MA in Catholic School leadership at St Mary’s University, Twickenham, NPQH and PQSI qualifications.

I enjoy playing golf, reading and walking in my spare time!

Committees/Responsibilities

Admissions Committee

Quality of Education and Outcomes Committee

HR, Finance & Premises Committee

Registered Interest

Headteacher at St Aloysius' College

Profile

I am a corporate lawyer, practising as a partner with a City law firm. Most of my clients are high growth, technology companies. I am also a Foundation Governor at St Joseph’s Catholic Primary School in Islington and a parish councillor at St Joseph’s Catholic Church. I am also the mother of three children aged 6 to 11.

Committees/Responsibilities

Quality of Education and Outcomes Committee

HR, Finance & Premises Committee

Elected By:

Diocese

Registered Interest

Governor at St Joseph's RC Primary School, Islington

Term of Office Reviewed:

August 2025

Profile

I am a Foundation Governor of St Aloysius’ College, and have been a Foundation Governor of St Joseph’s Roman Catholic Primary School since 2012. I am a retired chartered accountant with a particular interest in computer systems based on earlier employment with IBM and research into artificial intelligence. For several years I co-ordinated UK support for an Irish charity starting a successful new university in Uganda. Outside the educational sector I have served on the management board of a housing association, housing single homeless people in London.

Committees/Responsibilities

HR, Finance & Premises Committee

Elected By:

Diocese

Registered Interest

Governor at St Joseph's RC Primary School, Islington

Term of Office Reviewed:

August 2022

Profile

I am a qualified Social Worker and have worked with vulnerable children and families for over 20 years in both a front line and management capacity. My experience incorporates working in child protection, youth justice and with looked after children. I have also managed an Alternative Provision for excluded young people. I am passionate about supporting pupils’ emotional health wellbeing and welfare. I am committed to working to enhance the experience of the boys’ all round education and to raise their aspirations and achievements. I am the mother of two boys aged 10 and 12 and am an Islington resident.

Committees/Responsibilities

HR, Finance & Premises Committee

Admissions Committee

Elected By:

Governing Body

Registered Interest

Works at New North Academy, Islington

Term of Office Reviewed:

March 2022

Profile

I have worked in Education for fourteen years, ten of these at St Aloysius' College, and I currently hold the post of Head of English. I obtained my degree in English and History in Ireland at University College Dublin, but trained to teach here in the UK, in Essex. I have experience of teaching across a range of schools, both in the UK and abroad. I am a keen reader and enjoy travel, supporting Liverpool F.C. and running in my spare time.

Committees/Responsibilities

Quality of Education Committee

Elected By:

Staff at St Aloysius' College

Registered Interest

None

Term of Office Reviewed:

September 2023

Profile

I am a Local Authority Governor at St Aloysius and have also held the post of Parent Governor at Berrymede Infant School. I am a former secondary school History teacher with over 12 years' experience in the education sector. I am dedicated to raising standards in education and committed to ensuring all young people have a positive experience in school and leave with high aspirations for their future endeavours.

Committees/Responsibilities

Quality of Education and Outcomes Committee

Appeals Committee

Elected By:

Local Authority

Registered Interest

None

Term of Office Reviewed:

July 2023

Profile

I am a Foundation Governor at St Aloysius College. I currently work as a Civil Servant and have worked across many government departments in range of policy, strategy, and project management roles – including online safety, net zero and enterprise. I have done a lot of work in outreach, mentoring and careers support, especially for those from under-represented groups and want to ensure that students at St Aloysius College have the best access and support available to ensure better outcomes and raise their aspirations. I also attended St Aloysius College in the not-too-distant past, so will be able to offer some unique insight regarding my experience.

Committees/Responsibilities

Quality of Education Committee

Elected By:

Diocese

Registered Interest

Term of Office Reviewed:

August 2025
